description: The file serves as the main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up environment variables, initializing state management with a provider, and defining the root widget for the 'Notes' app.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application that provides theme and navigation setup.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application's entry point, initializes dependencies, loads environment variables, and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the root widget, setting up the provider and MaterialApp.
